title: Choripan with Ranchitas Nacho Cheese
ingredients: 4 Spanish chorizos or sausages of your choice.
instructions: Step 1. Place the oil in a skillet and cook the chorizos or sausages.
Step 2. Spread mustard on each bun as desired.
Step 3. Place three Ranchitas Nacho Cheese chips in each bun, then add the chorizos and a portion of guacamole.
